name: CRZNS
description:
CRZNS is a mix of casual, clicker and base defense games, where player needs to protect his base from zombies for certain amount of time to win. The idea was inspired by current world situation

There are three unique levels that player can choose among to play, each one has unique setting and history. Every level has different enemy’s spawns, what makes every level to have unique player’s experience in terms of gameplay.

 

Player’s main goal is to survive for certain amount of time to win. There are many zombies that are coming to destroy his base, base has certain amount of health points. As health points are less or equal then 0 – player lost.

 

The longer player survives – the stronger zombies are spawning and game becomes more difficult as player reaches certain time marks. There are 4 game phases, that change current level and make it more difficult for the player to protect his base.

don't take it too serious...

This is the university project for Frederick University, CY.
